subject: Re: testCreate, testUpdate, testDelete: make one single test out of it?
msgSnippet: ... This tool seems to be ok. But I am missing easy configuration of it like I can do with the Audit plugin from Togethersoft. I want to configure each rule in
messageBody:
> pmd.sf.net
>
> code "validator"
>
> -Vladimir

This tool seems to be ok. But I am missing easy configuration of it
like I can do with the Audit plugin from Togethersoft.

I want to configure each rule in the preferences of Eclipse: What
are long or short names? I want to specify what are long names for
me by entering a number. This would be very user friendly.

And I want to be able to deactivate a single rule inside a ruleset
from within Eclipse preferences.

I hope they will improve that tool in this direction.
